statements: SELECT * FROM User WHERE id = 1
SELECT username FROM User WHERE id > 10
SELECT id, username FROM User WHERE password = 'password123'
SELECT * FROM User WHERE username LIKE 'A%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM User
SELECT * FROM User ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT DISTINCT username FROM User
SELECT MIN(id), MAX(id) FROM User
SELECT AVG(id) FROM User
SELECT * FROM User LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM User OFFSET 10
SELECT * FROM User WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM User WHERE id BETWEEN 5 AND 10
SELECT * FROM User WHERE id NOT IN (2, 4, 6)
SELECT * FROM User WHERE username IS NULL
SELECT * FROM User WHERE password IS NOT NULL
SELECT id, username, password FROM User WHERE id = 2 OR id = 4
SELECT * FROM User WHERE id = 10 LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM User WHERE username = 'john_doe'
SELECT * FROM User WHERE id = 3 AND password = 'test123'
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT user_id, username FROM users
SELECT * FROM roles
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles
SELECT * FROM permissions
SELECT permission_id, permission_name FROM permissions
SELECT u.user_id, u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN roles r ON u.user_id = r.role_id
SELECT u.user_id, u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN roles r ON u.user_id = r.role_id JOIN permissions p ON r.role_id = p.permission_id
SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u LEFT JOIN roles r ON u.user_id = r.role_id LEFT JOIN permissions p ON r.role_id = p.permission_id
SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u RIGHT JOIN roles r ON u.user_id = r.role_id RIGHT JOIN permissions p ON r.role_id = p.permission_id
SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u FULL JOIN roles r ON u.user_id = r.role_id FULL JOIN permissions p ON r.role_id = p.permission_id
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'example_username'
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name = 'admin'
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id = 2
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE permission_name = 'read'
SELECT permission_id, permission_name FROM permissions WHERE permission_id = 3
SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN roles r ON u.user_id = r.role_id JOIN permissions p ON r.role_id = p.permission_id WHERE u.user_id = 1
SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u LEFT JOIN roles r ON u.user_id = r.role_id LEFT JOIN permissions p ON r.role_id = p.permission_id WHERE p.permission_id = 3
SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u RIGHT JOIN roles r ON u.user_id = r.role_id RIGHT JOIN permissions p ON r.role_id = p.permission_id WHERE r.role_id = 2
SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u FULL JOIN roles r ON u.user_id = r.role_id FULL JOIN permissions p ON r.role_id = p.permission_id WHERE r.role_name = 'editor'
SELECT * FROM Users
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users
SELECT username, password FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT * FROM Roles
SELECT role_name FROM Roles
SELECT * FROM Permissions
SELECT permission_name FROM Permissions
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM UserRoles
SELECT * FROM Users JOIN UserRoles ON Users.user_id = UserRoles.user_id
SELECT Users.username, Roles.role_name FROM Users JOIN UserRoles ON Users.user_id = UserRoles.user_id JOIN Roles ON UserRoles.role_id = Roles.role_id

SELECT username, role_name, permission_name FROM Users JOIN UserRoles ON Users.user_id = UserRoles.user_id JOIN Roles ON UserRoles.role_id = Roles.role_id JOIN Permissions ON Roles.role_id = Permissions.permission_id
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE username LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM Users ORDER BY username ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Users
SELECT MAX(user_id) FROM Users
SELECT AVG(user_id) FROM Users
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS num_roles FROM UserRoles GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_roles > 1
SELECT user_id, MAX(role_id) AS max_role_id FROM UserRoles GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY max_role_id DESC LIMIT 10
